text: Ezɨ atrivim kamaghɨn men akam ikaragha ghaze, “A dera, kɨ ian nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn mangam.” Egha Devit dɨvazir nguibar ekiam avɨnizimɨn tiar akar ekiamɨn mɨriamɨn tughav ikia garima, mɨdorozir gumazibar sueba voroghɨra dɨka azenan zui. Mɨdorozir gumaziba vaghvagha uan okoruabar aven iti, okoruar mamɨn dɨbobonim 1,000plan gumaziba iti, ezɨ okoruar mamɨn dɨbobonim 100plan gumaziba iti. Egha me bar uan okoruabar voroghɨra dɨka aven zui.
